<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Limited">[Turpin Rowe Lumberjack](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=40)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 75</row>

You are a feller of trees and a skilled axe wielder, trained in the art of forestry by the hard-working loggers of Turpin Rowe.

name: Turpin Rowe Lumberjack
search_markdown:
<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 75</row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

**Access**
You must befriend at least one Turpin Rowe logger.

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You are a feller of trees and a skilled axe wielder, trained in the art of forestry by the hard-working loggers of Turpin Rowe.

</summary>
